items.content_html: A lightweight browser extension for quick and efficient note-taking, built with vanilla JavaScript. Basic Notes offers a clean, distraction-free interface for managing your thoughts without requiring any sign-up or external services.

items.content_html: Validate3 is a lightweight, developer-friendly library that simplifies form validation for blockchain-based applications. Built on React and TypeScript, this library provides custom hooks to validate blockchain addresses, check transaction parameters, and handle form submissions seamlessly.
items.title: J0shcodes/validate3: Validate3 is a lightweight, developer-friendly library that simplifies form validation for blockchain-based applications. Built on React and TypeScript, this library provides custom hooks to validate blockchain addresses, check transaction parameters, and handle form submissions seamlessly.

items.content_html: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you’re running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.
items.title: DraouM/StockFlow: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you’re running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.
